titleStmt.title: A thanksgiving sermon for His Majesty's safe return and for the happy and honourable peace, of which God has made him the glorious instrument, Preached in Highgate Chapel, on Thursday the 2d of December, 1697. BY R. L. V.A.L.
titleStmt.author: R. L.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 5 reads: Colossians III. 15. And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body, and by ye thankful.
Running title reads: A thanksgiving sermon, for His Majesty's safe return, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Bamburgh Castle deposit, Durham.
